meanings.definition: The quality or state of being reddish in color.
meanings.sent1: The beautiful sunset displayed a lovely reddishnesses.
meanings.sent2: The artist mixed red and orange to create a unique reddishnesses in the painting.
meanings.sent3: The reddishnesses of the apple made it look like it was blushing.
meanings.sent4: The reddishnesses of the autumn leaves painted the trees in warm hues.
meanings.sent5: The reddishnesses of the fire glowed in the darkness of the night.

meanings.definition: The act or process of becoming reddish in hue.
meanings.sent1: The slow reddishnesses of the sky signaled the approaching sunrise.
meanings.sent2: The gradual reddishnesses of the dye showed that it was ready to be used.
meanings.sent3: The sudden reddishnesses of his cheeks gave away his embarrassment.
meanings.sent4: The reddishnesses of the clouds hinted at an impending storm.
meanings.sent5: The reddishnesses of the flower petals deepened as they absorbed more sunlight.
